about_the_game:
Rogueween is a thrilling roguelike, bullet hell, top-down arena shooter game where you fight in an arena filled with Halloween-themed enemies, make powerful builds, and face spooky challenges.

THRILLING GAMEPLAY!
You will fight in an arena and battle through waves of enemies, with the intensity ramping up as you progress. To fight, you need a candy weapon that spawns in the arena constantly. After finishing a wave, treats and tricks will show up to give a power-up or challenge. This flow loops until you reach the end where you fight a scary boss to finish things up!

BRAVE CHARACTERS!

Select from a diverse roster of unique characters, each with their own strengths, weaknesses, and playstyles. Discover characters with distinct abilities and stats, ranging from nimble ranger to powerful knight. Find the character that best suits your combat style and embark on your adventure.

CANDY WEAPONS!

Discover a variety of candies, each acting as a weapon with distinct shooting abilities and stats. From rapid-fire gumball to shotgun-like caramel, these candies offer a diverse range of combat styles. Experiment with different candies to find the perfect combination that suits your approach to the chaotic battlefield.

POWERFUL TREATS!

Select a treat after each wave, providing powerful enhancements to your abilities. These treats can synergize in unique ways, allowing you to craft builds that enhance your strengths or mitigate your weaknesses. Whether you prefer a more defensive playstyle or an all-out offensive strategy, the right combination of treats can make all the difference.

TRICK ENCOUNTERS!

Tricks add an extra layer of difficulty, presenting challenges such as enemy buffs or additional obstacles in the arena. These tricks keep you on your toes, forcing you to adapt your tactics and add a more exhilarating gameplay experience.

SPOOKY ENEMIES!

Face off against a variety of Halloween-themed enemies, each with unique attack patterns and movement behaviors. These spooky foes come with different stats such as health, movement speed, and damage. As you progress through the waves, the spawning rate of enemies ramps up, increasing the challenge and intensity of the battles.

JOIN THE HALLOWEEN MAYHEM!

Immerse yourself in the festive chaos of Rogueween, where every run is a new adventure filled with spooky enemies, powerful candies, synergistic treats, and challenging tricks. Whether you’re a seasoned roguelike bullet hell veteran or a newcomer to the genre, Rogueween offers a captivating and rewarding experience that will keep you coming back for more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible GPU with at least 512MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU with at least 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Rogueween is a roguelike, bullet hell, top-down arena shooter game where candies grant shooting abilities, treats provide power-ups, tricks offer extra challenges, and you battle waves of Halloween-themed enemies in this action-packed adventure!
